name: Make it snow game example
description:
A simple infinite sledder game mixed with a hole-in-the-wall game.

This is the source code mentioned in this tutorial that covers a quick game I made weeks ago but forgot to do anything with it...so my rehashing covers most of it in the accompanying youtube video 

Arrows keys change your shape.  Match the shape to gain speed.  Mess up and you will slow to a crawl.

This is source code for a Gdevelop game ...in a zip file.
